items.headline: My father’s estate was awarded $50K in a class-action lawsuit. My brother, as executor, kept the money. What can we do?
items.summary_en: “My brother retains the money awarded to my father to this day. My mom is still alive.”

items.headline: Starbucks to sell control of China business to private equity. Here’s how much the stake is worth.
items.summary_en: The U.S. coffee-shop chain is forming a joint venture with Boyu Capital, with Boyu holding 60% interest in the company’s retail operations in China. Starbucks will retain the other 40% and continue to own and license the Starbucks brand and intellectual property in the new entity.
